Posted By: DB
Looking to purchase Sherry Magie error card. Would like to pay with paypal if possible. Please email me at kilaartist@aol.com if you have the card and are looking to sell. Thank you.

DB

Posted By: Adam
If you don't find one before, Robert Edward Auctions will have 5 Magies in their upcoming April/May 2009 auction.

Good luck in your hunt, it's a cool card!
